comment: Good teacher, a bit unorganized but if you follow the schedule you should do ok. Turn in labs online on time and paper copies to him. Check out the chapter reviews prior to tests and you will do just fine. He does care about his students.

Good teacher, a bit unorganized but if you try to follow the schedule you should do ok. Turn in labs online on time and paper copies to him. Check out the chapter reviews prior to tests and you will do just fine.
Coach Montgomery is a good teacher. Come to class, participate and turn in labs, submit your weekly report and you will have no problem. He also gives many opportunities for extra credit.

Super easy. He won't let you in if you arrive even a minute late but attendance isn't mandatory anyway. You do short "labs" with the online textbook but they usually take less than 5 minutes. Take him, it's easy and if you follow the syllabus you don't need to come to class.

He is so easy. I mean it is HPS, how hard could it be? But, the test come straight from the kendall hunt wensite post test, I made a 100 on a test because I did the CTQ's on the KH website and then did the post test, The question are exactly the same. The labs are all participation.
He is simply a man of God. He is always ready to assist and help students at anytime.I will recommend him anyday.

He's great!  He gives you a study guide before exam.  Labs are just participation grade.  You use the HPS online textbook so you kinda have to purchase it (because the labs are in there).  Nice guy, not too boring, and knows his stuff.  I would recommend him.

The class is not hard at all. How hard could Health Be? If you do the work you get an A. I went on vacation in the middle of the semester and missed a test still finished with a B. He gives helpful study guides to tell you everything his tests will be on and the homeworks are easy. I did most of them in class the day they were due. Takes attendance
Easy A if you show up,do the Homework and use the study guides he provides. Participation is necessary, but not too bad. I highly recommend!!
Very easy class if you attend ! Do the practice critical thinking questions and you'll ace every test. Be on time.
He is a really nice guy, and he tries to make it fun and interesting while still trying to get the point across. He is a stickler for attendance though, he hates tardiness. Tests are easy.
